reviews.content: Dabangg 3 story was good 1st half was good but 2nd half more entertaining its good movie cast salman sir was good
Disappointing and nowhere near the levels it achieved earlier in the series.

I have this problem where if I start a series, I intend to watch the entirety of it. I fully expected "Dabangg 3" to be nonsense, and it was, but it was also super boring. I think if they made an hour and a half movie with over the top fight scenes and music, I could accept it for mindless entertainment. However, this is never the case with these movies. As always, there is an attempt to create emotions and a story and it fails spectacularly. The movie's story does not make any sense and the origin story aspect is a total snooze fest. The villain in this movie is given no depth whatsoever and is just a bad guy who does bad things. Overall, it is a movie that drags for two and a half hours and is truly the worst entry in one of the worst Bollywood series I have ever seen.
totally shity.......
Poor acting , no story , poor villain . Even if u leave ur brains at home , you will not enjoy. Suggest you to even keep your eyes at home

I am not sure how long will they keep making movies like this. I have never before felt like leaving the theatre in the middle of a movie. Avoid.

This movie tried to make me entertain ed and failed at it. The opening is good but the rest of the movie felt like a drag. The origin subplot is boring and tries to explain everything. From his sunglasses to almost every one liners and let me give the movie a tip (You don't need to explain everything in a origin story!). I felt that the new romantic lead played by Saiee Manjrekar has a character so boring that I didn't even cared about her. It way less funny than the movie thinks it is. If the movie had good character and some it would be enjoyable.
Great storyline that never gets old. A nice mix of everything to to make a great movie and has something for everyone.
Over the top acting, too many songs and a muddled story. Too many fighting scenes. I loved the first two Dabang movies but was disappointed with this third one.

Worst movie I have ever seen. He needs to retire from the entire Bollywood industry ASAP. Absolutely horrible movie. I wanted to die within the first 10 minutes. From the 10 songs that were squeezed in the randomest places to the horrible CGI with the cheesy action sequences, I don’t know how this movie was even allowed to get released. Anyone who said this was a good movie needs to wake up.

very boring movie. if i was 10 years old i would have laughed but the jokes were very bad. the story had engless songs, everytime the movie got serious we had a song. the girl kept falling for half hour made me yawn (you'll know when you watch it) at home that is. i would recommend watching this movie at home not theater worthy because of bad directing.

Stellar performances from all involved, directing of the highest caliber, and explosive action scenes that’ll make you say “WOWIE.” DABANGG 3 has it all. A star making turn from its lead actor, multiple references to some of your favorite conspiracy theories, and a free slice of pizza upon purchase of a ticket. Even if it means missing the holidays with your family, don’t let your chance to see DABANGG 3 in theaters slip away!
